text:
Hey just doing a little research and wanting your guys feedback. 

What are the pros and cons of developing as website using the drag and drop editor against using the localised boilerplate? 

Which in your option is the better way to create a website?
boilerplate overall gives you so much more granular control and flexibility. You can take that base code and modify the heck out of it, turn it into whatever you want.
i don’t mind a simplified approach for a tiny site, but once it gets over a few pages, the tradeoffs start to really show up.
Thanks for you response Melinda. I’ve got to agree here. I love the flexibility of the boilerplate and the control it gives.
